p.s: In the play Disgraced, Scene 3 by Ayad Akhtar, Amir is a 40-years old lawyer and also the Protagonistprotagonist of the Playplay.
In scene 3, Isaac who is a working partner of Emily (Amir's wife) and Jory (Isaac's wife), who is also a lawyer, comes to visit Amir and Emily.
When Isaac and Emily got caught by Jory in an intimate moment.
The whole visit gets very chaotic.
Amir who is very emotional gets angry at Jory, because he believes that she just want to ruin his marriage after she already stole his job (p. 71, l. 18-19).
Amir thinks that itsit's unfair because he works much harder than Jory.
He also says that she was never at work before anyone else or last one to leave (p. 72, l. 25-28).
When Isaac tells Jory to not listen any more out of this asshole (p. 72, l. 30), Amir insults Isaac back and they go face to face.
Full of anger, Amir spits Isaac in his face because a long time ago his mother spat him (Amir) in his face when he was a young boy because he had a crush on ana Jewish Girlgirl.
When Isaac and Jory left, Amir and Emily are alone.
Amir asks Emily with a strong but intense voice if she slept with Isaac.
Amir loves Emily and therefore they don't get instantly in the next conflict (p. 73, l. 27).
Emily who also loves Amir, doesn't want to lie again and tells him the truth.
Amir who was sure that Jory just wanted to destroy their marriage, is overwhelmed by his emotions.
Without any thoughts he punches Emily and just realizerealizes later what he havehas done.
Amir totally regrets it but at this point it's totoo late.
Later in the Playplay Amir lost his job and doesn't live anymore with Emily.
In general one can say that Amir is a very emotional person who is sometimes too much controlled, manipulates or overwhelmed by his emotions and therefore he regrets actions taken in the past.
